title: Single Variable Linear Equations
description: This quiz tests your understanding of single variable linear equations. You will solve equations of the form ax + b = c, where a, b, and c are constants. The quiz includes multiple-choice questions to assess your ability to isolate the variable and find its value.

title: Quadratic Equations with Real Roots
description: This quiz focuses on quadratic equations that have real roots. You will solve equations of the form ax^2 + bx + c = 0, where a, b, and c are constants. The quiz includes questions on factoring, using the quadratic formula, and identifying the nature of the roots based on the discriminant.
